articles.author: Matthew Cappucci
articles.title: Fireball appears to explode over Southeastern U.S. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Meteor Society has received nearly 150 reports of a fireball spotted around 12:24 p.m. Eastern time.
articles.content:
A fireball, or an exceptionally bright meteor, appears to have exploded in the skies over the southeastern U.S. on Thursday.
The American Meteor Society has received nearly 150 reports of a fireball… [+2158 chars]

articles.title: Anna Wintour steps down as Vogue editor-in-chief, but will retain control of storied magazine - CNN
articles.description: After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down, but will still oversee Vogue’s global editorial direction.
articles.content:
After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down and seeking a replacement.
